attributes.action: Scrap the planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy once and for all!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The idea of tracking every vehicle at all times is sinister and wrong. Road pricing is already here with the high level of taxation on fuel. The more you travel - the more tax you pay.

It will be an unfair tax on those who live apart from families and poorer people who will not be able to afford the high monthly costs.

We already pay for driving our vehicles: Fuel, Insurance etc. We DO NOT need any more "milking".

If implemented, the "pay as you drive" sceme will only do one thing: give more money to the Government to waste. It WILL NOT improve the amount of traffic on the roads.

Please Mr Blair - forget about road pricing and concentrate on improving our roads to reduce congestion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
